filepath.description: A relative path to a file

title.description: A brief and descriptive title for this workflow

description.description: A detailed explanation of the purpose and function of this workflow

name.description: A unique identifier for this task

title.description: A brief and descriptive title for this task

description.description: A detailed explanation of the purpose and function of this task

motivation.description: The reason why this task is necessary within the context of the workflow

title.description: A short title that summarizes this section of script

url.description: A https link to a webpage

links.description: A list of relevant resources and references related to this task

parameters.description: A list of configurable options for this task

name.description:
Name of the step with either:
unknown: Describe any unknown or uncertain aspects of the process (should not pick this)
main: Describe the main step of the process
before: Describe a step that need to be taken before the process begins
after: Describe a step that need to be taken after the process is completed

if.description: A conditional statement that determines whether or not this script or command should be executed

name.description: The name of the variable to be used as an input to the script or command during each iteration

values.description: The variable to the array of values to be iterated over

each.description: An array of values to be iterated over, with each iteration executing the script or command with the current value as an input

name.description: A short name that could be used a key or variable for the step

description.description: The main purpose of this section of script

motivation.description: The main reason why this section of script is needed

anyOf.description: Get a property using a dot prop path

onSuccess.description:
Options for the transforming the resulting array of string with either:
sort: Sorts the array of strings in ascending order.
unique: Removes any duplicate strings from the array.
filled: Removes any empty or undefined elements from the array.
reverse: Reverses the order of the elements in the array.

if.description:
A conditional statement that determines whether or not the string should be kept with either:
starts-with: Match items that start with a specific value
ends-with: Match items that end with a specific value
contains: Match items that contain a specific value
equals: Match items that are equal to a specific value
not starts-with: Match items that do not start with a specific value
not ends-with: Match items that do not end with a specific value
not contains: Match items that do not contain a specific value
not equals: Match items that are not equal to a specific value

anyOf.description: A list of references to match against

filters.description: A list of filters on strings

anyOf.description: Process on a list of strings
Concatenate several arrays together

separator.description: A separator to split the string

anyOf.description: Split a string into multiple strings
Split a string into multiple lines
Return true if at least one of values is truthy
Return true if at least one of values is falsy
Return true if all the values are truthy
Return true if all the values are falsy
Return the opposite boolean value

start.description: The number to start the range with

end.description: The number at the end of the range

step.description: A step to increment the range, usually 1

anyOf.description: Generate a range of numbers
Invert keys and values into a new object

mask.description: JSON mask to select parts of the json object

anyOf.description: Uses JSON mask to select parts of the json object

template.description: Resolve the handlebars template as a atring. https://handlebarsjs.com/guide/

anyOf.description: Uses JSON mask to select parts of the json object

message.description: A short message that will display in the prompt

anyOf.description: Prompt that takes user input and returns a string
Prompt that returns true or false
Prompt that takes user input, hides it from the terminal, and returns a string
Prompt that allows the user to select from a list of options
Prompt that allows the user to choose an option

filename.description: The name of the file to which data will be appended

anyOf.description: Step where data is appended to a file

filename.description: The name of the file to which data will be written

anyOf.description: Step where data is written to a file

name.description: A short name that could be used a key or variable

description.description: The main purpose of this section of script

motivation.description: The main reason why this section of script is needed

items.description:
Options for when the shell command finish with either:
exit: Exit the shell after the command has finished.
silent: Suppress any output from the command.
trim: Remove any leading or trailing whitespace from the output.
json: Format the output as a JSON object.
yaml: Format the output as a YAML object.
csv: Format the output as a CSV file.
save: Save the output to a file.
debug: Print debugging information about the command execution.

onFailure.description: List of flags to describe the default behavior in case of failure

onSuccess.description: List of flags to describe the default behavior in case of success

if.description: reference to JSON path that must be satisfied for the step to run

stdin.description: Provide stdin with a value read from a dot prop path

multiline.description: Should the run command spread on multiple lines

anyOf.description: Configuration for the batch shell script

commands.description: A list of batch shell scripts to run

main.description: The primary script or command to be executed for this task

before.description: A batch of shell commands to run

after.description: A batch of shell commands to run

tasks.description: A list of individual tasks that make up this workflow

additionalProperties.description: A domain for a list of tasks

workflows.description: A collection of related tasks and processes that achieve a specific goal
